function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Frequent references to the visceral experience of being in the city under COVID-19.","Impact":"Emphasizes the potential for transmission and spread of contagious diseases in urban environments.","Mitigation":"Promote measures such as social distancing, mask-wearing, and hygiene practices.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, air quality monitoring systems, and crowd density tracking technologies.","People":"City residents, urban workers, commuters, and travelers.","Owner":"Local health authorities, city planners, and urban developers."}]}
